dialogues.name: ClassmateB
dialogues.content: Hey, Vincent, a few of us are planning to play basketball this weekend. Do you want to join us?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Oh, this weekend? I'll have to check. I've been quite busy with studying lately.

dialogues.name: ClassmateB
dialogues.content: Come on, it'll be a good break. It's important to relax a bit, too, right?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yeah, you're right. Alright, I'll join in. Playing basketball does sound like a nice way to unwind.

dialogues.name: ClassmateB
dialogues.content: Great! We won't play for too long, just enough to have some fun and get a bit of exercise.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: That sounds good. See you on the weekend then. I'm looking forward to playing together.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I understand, and normally I would love to join. But with the exams coming up, I really need to focus. Maybe another time?

dialogues.name: ClassmateB
dialogues.content: Alright, I get it. Exams are important. Well, if you change your mind, let us know!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Thanks for understanding. I'll definitely join you guys next time. Good luck, and have fun!
